meanings.definition: To eat less food than the body requires for proper functioning.
meanings.sent1: She was undereating, causing her body to lack essential nutrients.
meanings.sent2: It is important not to undereat, as it can lead to health issues.
meanings.sent3: The cat was undereating its food, pretending to be on a diet.
meanings.sent4: Undereating the knowledge available is like trying to run a marathon without training.
meanings.sent5: Undereating can be harmful, so it's crucial to listen to your body's needs.

meanings.definition: The act of consuming insufficient amounts of food.
meanings.sent1: His undereating was evident from his lack of energy throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: Undereating can result in weakness and fatigue over time.
meanings.sent3: The undereating at the party left everyone hungry for more.
meanings.sent4: Her undereating of knowledge made her ill-prepared for the exam.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of undereating can impact both physical and mental health.
